sys_script_include.name: shipmentInclude

sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>package_private</access><active>true</active><api_name>x_1753077_osandd.shipmentInclude</api_name><caller_access/><client_callable>true</client_callable><description/><mobile_callable>false</mobile_callable><name>shipmentInclude</name><sandbox_callable>true</sandbox_callable><script><![CDATA[var GetShipmentDetails = Class.create();
GetShipmentDetails.prototype = Object.extendsObject(AbstractAjaxProcessor, {
    getShipmentInfo: function() {
        var shipmentId = this.getParameter('sysparm_shipment_id');
        var gr = new GlideRecord('x_1753077_osandd_shipment'); // Replace with your table name
        if (gr.get('shipment_id', shipmentId)) {
            var result = {
                customer: gr.getValue('customer'),
                product: gr.getValue('product')
            };
            return JSON.stringify(result);
        }
        return '';
    }
});
]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2025-05-25 14:03:35</sys_created_on><sys_id>38027460833526109242ba29feaad383</sys_id><sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count><sys_name>shipmentInclude</sys_name><sys_package display_value="OSandD" source="x_1753077_osandd">8a5ce6cc8375a2109242ba29feaad33c</sys_package><sys_policy>read</sys_policy><sys_scope display_value="OSandD">8a5ce6cc8375a2109242ba29feaad33c</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_include_38027460833526109242ba29feaad383</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2025-05-25 14:17:25</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include></record_update>
